content: the spring creek star stitch pumpkin is a digital pdf download of a textured crochet pumpkin pattern with a fun boho vibe the pattern is designed in worsted 4wt weight yarn includes instructions for three sizes a photo tutorial and has a detailed explanation for creating custom sizes too you can also find a step-by-step video tutorial on my youtube channel @alpenglowbasin crochet pumpkins bring beautiful texture and color into your home throughout the autumn season they can be embellished with all sorts of finishing touches i like to use organic elements like wood stems and twine to keep them rustic but really the sky is the limit level easy - adv beginner terminology us terminology in english dimensions 3 sizes approximate diameter x height mini - 4 x 3 inch / 10 x 7 5 cm small - 6 x 4 5 inch / 15 x 11 5 cm medium - 8 x 5 in / 20 x 13 cm worsted 4 wt/10 wpi/4-ply 100% acrylic or acrylic blend yarn shown in yarn bee easygoing in willow and cottage rose and pearlspun in rust < 1 skein per pumpkin amount approximate in yd/m/oz/g mini - 44/41/0 9/25 small - 96/88/1 5/44 med - 150/137/2 2/63 crochet hook h8 - 5 00mm yarn needle stem e g wood cinnamon stick twine or ribbon polyfill or other stuffing rocks or other weights optional scissors gauge 7 stars x 8 4 row reps = 4 inch square gauge is not overly critical for this project pumpkin sizes are approximate and will vary some depending on how they are stuffed and shaped ©copyright 2021 corri schmidt reproduction of this pattern is prohibited you may sell items made from this pattern please credit alpenglow basin fiber arts on the tag or a link in your item description to https //www ravelry com/patterns/sources/alpenglow-basin-fiber-arts-ravelry-store please tag social media posts with @alpenglowbasin and #alpenglowbasin thank you
